mapper.delete: delete from favorite where spaceNum = #{spaceNum} and membernum = #{membernum}
mapper.insert: insert into space(num, membernum, name, type, contentssim, contentscom, warning, mainimage, site, address, email, hp, operatingtime, holiday, grade, status, regdate) values (space_seq.nextval, #{membernum}, #{name}, #{type}, #{contentssim}, #{contentscom}, #{warning}, #{mainimage}, #{site}, #{address}, #{email}, #{hp}, #{operatingtime}, #{holiday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grade}, #{status}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select num from (select * from space order by rownum desc) where rownum = 1
